title: Carsten Linnemann
summary: Carsten Christoffer Linnemann (born 10 August 1977) is a German economist and politician of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) who has been a member of the German Bundestag since the 2009 election, representing Paderborn. Since 2022, he has been one of five deputy chairs of the CDU, under the leadership of chairman Friedrich Merz.From 2013 until 2021, Linnemann served as the chairman of MIT, the pro-business wing in the CDU/CSU.
